name: output_schema

summary.description: High-level overview of the individual's psychological configuration.

core_motives.description: Primary psychological motives driving behavior, reasoning, and emotional regulation.

conflict_patterns.description: Internal contradictions shaping behavior under strain.

stress_profile.description: Shifts in behavior and reasoning under elevated stress.

identity_structure.description: How the individual constructs personal identity and meaning.

full_narrative.description: Unified psychological narrative generated by the template system.

notes: The output schema defines the final report structure. It does not generate content â€” it defines what content must exist.
